item.title: Qualcomm's profit forecast disappoints as Apple battle takes toll
item.description:
Qualcomm's profit forecast disappoints as Apple battle takes toll
Reuters - 14 hours ago
(Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc (QCOM.O) forecast fourth-quarter profit below analysts' estimates as the company's escalating patent battle with Apple Inc (AAPL.O) continues to take a toll on its licensing business. Shares of the company were down 2.3 percent ...

item.title: Isabel Ge Mahe Named Apple's Managing Director of Greater China
item.description:
Isabel Ge Mahe Named Apple's Managing Director of Greater China
Benzinga - Jul 19, 2017
Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) today announced that Isabel Ge Mahe, vice president of Wireless Technologies, has been named vice president and managing director of Greater China, reporting to CEO Tim Cook and COO Jeff Williams.
